member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_CONDITION
member.summary: Used by the GUID_ACDC_POWER_SOURCE power event to indicate the current power source.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_CONDITION.PoAc
member.summary: The computer is powered by an AC power source (or similar, such as a laptop powered by a 12V automotive adapter).

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_CONDITION.PoDc
member.summary: The system is receiving power from built-in batteries.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_CONDITION.PoHot
member.summary: The computer is powered by a short-term power source such as a UPS device.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_CONDITION.PoConditionMaximum
member.summary: Values equal to or greater than this value indicate an out of range value.
